title: Would You Discipline Someone Else's Kid
itunes:title: Would You Discipline Someone Else's Kid
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about disciplining someone else's child after a scene on "The Kardashians" went viral about Corey Gamble stating he would discipline Scott Disick's child. Moreover, we also opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners had any challenges when it comes to interracial relationships. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Nancy Pelosi. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
